SELECT PROJECT_FUNCTION_NO, PROJECT_NO, FUNCTION_NAME, FUNCTION_MANAGER, FUNCTION_PROGRESS, FUNCTION_STATUS, TO_CHAR(FUNCTION_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FUNCTION_REGDATE, TO_CHAR(FUNCTION_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FUNCTION_ENDDATE, FUNCTION_PRIORITY, TO_CHAR(FUNCTION_MODIDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FUNCTION_MODIDATE, FUNCTION_NAME FROM PROJECT_FUNCTION WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#
AND FUNCTION_MANAGER = #mem_id#
AND FUNCTION_STATUS = #function_status#
AND FUNCTION_NAME LIKE '%'||#function_name#||'%'
AND FUNCTION_MANAGER = #function_manager#
SELECT PROJECT_NO, ROUND((SUM(FUNCTION_PROGRESS) / COUNT(*))) AVERAGE FROM PROJECT_FUNCTION WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no# GROUP BY PROJECT_NO
SELECT PROJECT_NO, ROUND((SUM(FUNCTION_PROGRESS) / COUNT(*))) AVERAGE FROM PROJECT_FUNCTION WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no# AND FUNCTION_MANAGER = #mem_id# GROUP BY PROJECT_NO
